snippet: Officials said that millions of people with health insurance purchased in the federal marketplace would need to switch plans to avoid increases in premiums or reductions in subsidies.
abstract: Obama administration officials say millions of people with health insurance they bought through federal marketplace will need to change to different health plans for 2015 to dodge anticipated increases in premiums or reductions in subsidies under Affordable Care Act.
lead_paragraph: Officials said that millions of people with health insurance purchased in the federal marketplace would need to switch plans to avoid increases in premiums or reductions in subsidies.

headline.main: Officials Say Price Comparison Is Crucial to Choosing Health Plans
headline.print_headline: Officials Say Price Comparison Is Crucial to Choosing Health Plans

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
